Package uk.ac.ox.comlab.diadem.oxpath.model.language

Interface Summary
Action Interface for OXPath actions
Axis Interface for axes in OXPath
NodeTest Interface for OXPath node tests
OXPathPredicate Interface encoding OXPath predicates from steps.
Step interface enclosing steps
 

Class Summary
AbstractAction abstract class to exploit commonalities among OXPath actions
ExplicitAction Class for explicit actions
KeywordAction Class for keyword actions
OXPathExtractionMarker class encoding OXPath Extraction Markers
OXPathStep Class encoding OXPath steps
ParameterizedProcessingInstruction Class encoding parameterized processing instruction node tests
PositionAction Class for explicit actions
SelectorPredicate implementation of selector predicates
URLAction class encoding url actions in OXPath
VariableAction Class implementing OXPath variable actions
XPathNameTest Class encoding XPath name tests
 

Enum Summary
AbbreviatedAxis Enum type encoding abbreviated axes in OXPath
AbbreviatedStep Enum encoding the abbreviated axes
ActionType Enum encoding action types
AxisType Enum type encoding type of axis
BackwardAxis Enum type encoding backward axes in OXPath
ForwardAxis Enum type encoding forward axes in OXPath
NodeTestType Enum encoding the different OXPath node test types
OXPathAxis Enum type encoding OXPath axes in OXPath
OXPathGeneralPredicates Enum type encoding XPath predicates and OXPath optional predicates
OXPathNodeTest Enum encoding OXPath node tests
OXPathPredicateTypes Enum encoding the different types of OXPath predicates
Selector Enum type encoding OXPath selectors borrowed from CSS
XPathNodeTest Enum encoding XPath node tests
